name: Adraki Gobi Gajar Mattar - Cauliflower Carrots and Peas saute with Cumin seeds and Ginger
description: Adraki Gobi Gajar Matter - Cauliflower Carrots Peas cooked with ginger and cumin seeds. Vegan Glutenfree Soyfree Nut-free Indian Recipe. How to make Spiced Cauliflower Carrots Pea stir fry.
recipeIngredient: 2-3 Tablespoons finely chopped or grated ginger
1  green chili finely chopped  (or chili flakes to taste)
1/2  head of Cauliflower chopped into small florets

recipeInstructions.text: In a large pan, heat on oil on medium high.
recipeInstructions.name: In a large pan, heat on oil on medium high.

recipeInstructions.text: Add cumin seeds and roast until fragrant. Reduce heat to medium.
recipeInstructions.name: Add cumin seeds and roast until fragrant. Reduce heat to medium.

recipeInstructions.text: Add ginger and chili and cook for 2-3 minutes until chili is golden.
recipeInstructions.name: Add ginger and chili and cook for 2-3 minutes until chili is golden.

recipeInstructions.text: Add cauliflower and carrots, cover and cook for 5 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Add cauliflower and carrots, cover and cook for 5 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: Add peas, salt, turmeric and mix well. Reduce heat to low, cover and cook until cauliflower is tender. 15 to 20 minutes. Serve hot topped with chopped cilantro.
recipeInstructions.name: Add peas, salt, turmeric and mix well. Reduce heat to low, cover and cook until cauliflower is tender. 15 to 20 minutes. Serve hot topped with chopped cilantro.
